biotools.summary:
Computational scanning tunneling microscope image database.

JARVIS-Tools: an open-source software package for data-driven atomistic materials design.

NIST-JARVIS (Joint Automated Repository for Various Integrated Simulations) is an integrated framework for computational science using density functional theory, classical force-field molecular dynamics and machine-learning.

The NIST Materials Data Curation System (MDCS) provides a means for capturing, sharing, and transforming materials data into a structured format that is XML based amenable to transformation to other formats.
